text: HELLO WORLD I AM WRITING THIS REVIEW TO YOU ON MY BRAND NEW USED IPHONE 16!!!! guys i’m so excited i’m the cow that jumps over the moon. the phone is stunning. one tiny scratch on the screen that I can’t even see while the screen is on, and it honestly took me a while to even find it. I messaged the seller and asked for one with 100% battery capacity and a low charge cycle, and while they said they wouldn’t be able to guarantee that it’s still what I got!! for less than $700 you can’t beat this!
The phone is a great upgrade, great condition it works very well a lot of storage space , great price and it look brand new
Good condition., good quality. Reasonable price. Looks brand new.
El pedido se entregó a tiempo sin problemas

Phone looks new and functions without issue so far. I’m very happy with the product and its price and had no issues with delivery or keeping track of my order as I did in the past with other sellers. Their communication was excellent and answered all my questions. The phone looks new and I recommend this seller to anyone looking to buy a phone. I’m very pleased and got it hassle free

The seller described this phone to a T.  It is in excellent condition, as described.  The shipping and packaging was very good.  It was shipped with a tracking number through Fed Ex and was delivered within 3 days of purchase.  I'm very satisfied with the phone.  I highly recommend this seller for refurbished phones.

Amazing experience with this transaction! The phone was received exactly or better than described "excellent  condition".  The quality for the value was above expectations as the phones appearance was like new!  The phone was shipped the following day after purchase and arrived within 3 days.  Would purchase from this seller again without hesitancy and definitely recommend.

Came in super fast and the packaging was nice! Seller was helpful when I wasn’t super satisfied with the condition of the phone. It unfortunately came with some scratches on the screen when it is supposed to be in excellent condition (reason why I put 4 stars.) 
Seller offered a partial refund and I keep the phone or just return for a full refund. I wasn’t too bothered with the scratches so I just took the partial refund. Would recommend!

Phone listed as very good but I would consider it excellent condition and price point was great. Received in a timely manner despite FedEx delivering to wrong address first attempt at delivery.  Customer service is excellent. Responded quickly to concern about shipping times. Wouldn’t hesitate to recommend seller to family and friends.

I ordered my phone and within 2 days it was shipped, and e mailed a tracking number. Great packaging along with any answers to my questions. Great quality and the phone was in mint condition. great value

Item received was as described.  Price was fair and seller was a great communicator and prompt shipper.  Unfortunately, the phone gave me his old was no longer needed as my son gave me his old one when he purchased a newer model.  The return and refund for this purchase was effortless and prompt.  This seller is an honest and AAA1 e-bay seller.

The phone was beautifully packaged and exactly as described! No chips, scratches or dings. It looks as if it was brand new. Shipping was fast and seller was very communicative! Overall a very positive experience and I will definitely order more and would recommend them to anyone.
